questions.question:
A machine learning engineer is using SageMaker Data Wrangler to preprocess data from multiple sources.
They want to analyze the relationships between different features in the dataset before selecting which features to include in model training.
The engineer also needs to understand which features might have the greatest impact on the target variable.
Which two functionalities of Data Wrangler will help the engineer achieve this? (Choose TWO)
options: Feature selection through automatic feature scaling.
Data visualization tools such as histograms and bar charts.
Exporting data directly to Amazon SageMaker for model deployment.
Feature importance visualization using the Quick Model.
correct_answers: Data visualization tools such as histograms and bar charts.
Feature importance visualization using the Quick Model.
questions.Practice test: AWS Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Practice Test 3 -
